MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL23 postcode areas of Llanfor, Llandderfel and the surrounding areas. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further network investigations needed to locate the fault and our team on site are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5.30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.26PM on 30th March 2021.
